column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I wish I came with a bigger group so I could have tried more things on the menu
column2: but 6 tapas for 4 people was plenty for us already. I was pretty obsessed with their roasted dates with bacon and apple vinaigrette (so juicy and flavorful...did not even know I could like dates)
column3: meatballs with sherry tomato sauce (I love meatballs
column4: and don't think sherry tomatoes are anything special
column5: but whatever they did with this combo made it so delicious)
column6: and spicy potatoes with tomato alioli (just all kinds of amazing
column7: definitely fancier than your regular home fries lol). The other things didn't wow me just because of my personal preferences (not crazy about blue cheese
column9: or seafood). Feast your eyes on these pics from our meal:
